abstract: Community Service Society, one of organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, buys Sydney Almorales two weekly Metro cards.
lead_paragraph: Sydney Almorales deferred his future after high school to tend to his dying stepfather, and then could not afford the subway trip to technology classes.
snippet: Sydney Almorales deferred his future after high school to tend to his dying stepfather, and then could not afford the subway trip to technology classes.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Community Service Society of New York

headline.main: From Caretaker to Computer Analyst Via a Nonprofit Technology School
headline.print_headline: From Caretaker to Computer Analyst via a Nonprofit Technology School
